description:
Qualifications

  • BA or BS in relevant field and at least five years of work experience.
  • Knowledge of MS Word, Excel, Access and Power Point
  • Knowledge of Federal grant submission procedures and of UCLA grant and contract management systems and procedures.
  • Knowledge of University personnel, finance and purchasing systems; also travel, accounts payable.
  • Excellent knowledge of English; skill in editing for spelling, syntax and grammar, and attention to detail.
  • Knowledge and experience in budget management
  • Knowledge and experience in personnel supervision. Familiarity with UCLA IRB submission and review procedures.
  • Ability to multi-task and keep up with deadlines and priorities on multiple projects.
  • Skill in setting priorities and analyzing the relative importance of multiple projects and tasks.
  • Communication and interpersonal skills to interact effectively with faculty, staff, administration, research participants, students, vendors, and others affiliated with the Division.
  • Discretion in handling confidential materials.
  • Ability to work with frequent interruptions.
  • Ability to work independently and rapidly, using sound judgment and personal initiative to deal with problems and competing requests for service.
  • Ability to maintain professional manner in conducting office business
